subject: Plus X gas pedal plate
description_text:
Good evening,

I would like to know if it was possible to buy only the gas pedal plate from your Plus X set as I find it absolutely amazing :




Thank you in advance for your answer, 
Kind regards,
Guillaume

conversations.body_text: Hi Guillaume Duchene,    You can purchase the clutch pedal through this link and note in your order that you need to replace the throttle pedal.  https://www.simsonn.com/products/simsonn-racing-simulator-pedal-black
